refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function clears all connection variables for current session and sets new ones defined in the array passed as parameter.

Connection variables do not persist across sessions, one may maintain persistence of variables by storing them in a database table, as discussed in Session Variables
-section.

refsect2.title: var_array
refsect2.para:
An array
of even number of elements, containing name-value pairs. NULL, will cause all connection variables for current connection to be erased.

example.title: Setting and Retrieving Connection Variables
example.screen:
